document.topic_text: Latest Features of SutiHR Enhance Human Resources Administration Los Altos, CA (PRWEB) August 10, 2016 SutiSoft Inc., a leading provider of easy-to-use web-based and mobile business management solutions, today announces that the recruitment, benefits, time management, document, and personnel modules of SutiHR, its online HR management platform, has been updated with new features. These updates further simplify workforce management activities. Recruitment: While creating a requisition, the HR administrator can select pay type as “salary or hourly” in the position details area In resume search page, HR administrator can now view when the resume was submitted Email templates: The solution includes default email templates that can be…
